subs.text: There weren't many blogs in November 2000, for the Bush/Gore election and the notorious Florida recount, but "scripting news" was there. Here are the archives for November and December 2000. Lots of interesting links. Scroll down to the end of November and start there.

Pro tip for "BingeWorthy". If a friend asks for ideas on something to watch, share a link to your profile page. It works without being logged-in. It's a smart way to share your favorites, and it also helps spread the word about BingeWorthy, which is nice. This is my profile page. A few more. Leo Laporte. NakedJen, Jake Savin, Liza Sperling, Francine Hardaway, Steve Garfield, Peter Politi.
